lines.name: Callinellus Malleus

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
All Attack Damage Chills when you Stun

lines.flavourText:
To neither ebb nor flow,
but weather the rising tide,
outlast, unshifting and unshifted,
until the waters recede and we stand together.

lines.name: Redbeak

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Damage when on Low Life
Gain 2 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
+2 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

lines.flavourText: As battle calms, blood turns to rust.

lines.name: Relentless Fury

explicitModifiers.text: (0.6-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for 3 seconds on Culling Strike
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Onslaught

lines.flavourText:
Relentless fury
Sunder my every foe
Fuel my boiling blood

lines.name: Rigwald's Savagery

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Physical Weapon Damage while Dual Wielding
(40-46)% increased Physical Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
+25 to Maximum Rage while wielding a Sword
25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Tear the flesh from the bone. 
Turn the bone to dust.
Scatter the dust to the wind.

lines.name: Rive

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
2% increased Physical Damage Over Time per 10 Dexterity
30% Chance to cause Bleeding Enemies to Flee on hit

lines.flavourText:
Terror doesn't make you jump.
Terror makes you run.

lines.name: The Dancing Dervish

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervishes on Rampage
Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervish on Rampage
Manifested Dancing Dervishes disables both weapon slots
Manifested Dancing Dervish disables both weapon slots
Manifested Dancing Dervishes die when Rampage ends
Manifested Dancing Dervish dies when Rampage ends

Melee Hits count as Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
Take your partners by the hand,
Keep your steps in time.
Swing together, spin apart,
And dance with death sublime.

lines.name: The Wasp Nest

implicitModifiers.text: Gain 40 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
+40 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text:
Attacks with this Weapon deal 80-120 added Chaos Damage against
Enemies affected by at least 5 Poisons

Attacks with this Weapon deal 80 to 120 added Chaos Damage against
Enemies affected by at least 5 Poisons

lines.flavourText:
To discover how cruel nature can be,
you need only shake the wrong branch.

lines.name: White Wind

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits while your Off Hand is empty
(100-200)% increased Cold Damage while your Off Hand is empty
+(15-40)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while your Off Hand is empty

lines.flavourText:
The Maraketh fear very little, 
but they dare not whisper the name
of the demon that flies on Winter's gales.

lines.name: Ahn's Might

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +50% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have no Frenzy Charges
+(400-500) to Accuracy Rating while at Maximum Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Impossibly heavy, yet the ancient edge is as keen as any modern blade's.
A reminder that, in the end, when we lie in the bellies of worms,
it is what we make that makes us."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 47

lines.name: Beltimber Blade

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles if you've used a Movement Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
By wind and wing they are carried,
Their fates not theirs to control,
Yet the fates of others dragged in their wake.

lines.name: Limbsplit

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems
Trigger Level 1 Gore Shockwave on Melee Hit if you have at least 150 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.name: Cane of Unravelling

implicitModifiers.text: +(18-20)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-55)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
2% increased Cast Speed per Power Charge
+2 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
Regenerate 2 Mana per Second per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Creation is the act of making the intangible tangible.
To work backwards, to make the tangible intangible,
is to step into the mind of a god."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Obliteration

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a (20-22)% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

lines.name: Goblinedge

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% increased Attack Speed if you haven't gained a Frenzy Charge Recently
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance if you haven't gained a Power Charge Recently
+3 seconds to Duration of Frenzy and Power Charges on Culling Strike

lines.flavourText:
"That bronze girl sure knows how to cut someone down to size!"
- Bertrand the Plush

lines.name: Storm Cloud
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

lines.name: Silverbranch

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

lines.name: Bloodplay

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"I'm a painter, and crimson is my chosen hue."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Storm Prison

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (9-11) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: (25-35)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.

lines.name: Eclipse Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: (120-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Every decade, Lunaris devours Solaris
Each time, Solaris emerges from Lunaris, born anew.

lines.name: Aurumvorax

explicitModifiers.text: +3 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain 3 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Many a collector of rarities discovered to his dismay
that the intelligent spirit in this sword
does not like to share its master's attention

lines.name: Kondo's Pride

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Melee Damage against Bleeding Enemies
Cannot Leech Life from Critical Strikes
30% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Faintly gleaming in the moonlit night,
Kondo's Pride was primed to fight.
Driven by an inner fire,
bloodlust, spite and ill desire.
He swiftly moved to strike them all,
wreaking havoc like a steel squall.

lines.name: Oro's Sacrifice

implicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy Charge if an Attack Ignites an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Give yourself to the flames and your name
will burn in the minds of men forever.

lines.name: Roth's Reach

explicitModifiers.text: (20-80)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Exiled to the sea; what a joke. 
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

lines.name: Shiversting

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
Stoic visage, icy heart.
Life of sorrow, lived apart.

lines.name: The Consuming Dark

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems
(30-45)% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Your Chaos Damage has 60% chance to Poison Enemies

lines.flavourText: The brightest flames cast the darkest shadows.

lines.name: Touch of Anguish

implicitModifiers.text: +(25-46) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (25-46) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Skills Chain an additional time while at maximum Frenzy Charges
Critical Strikes do not inherently Freeze

lines.flavourText:
Grip the frozen steel, feel it numb you.
Wield the cold touch of death like 
a splinter of your own shattered heart.

lines.name: Ungil's Gauche

explicitModifiers.text: +(12-20)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding

lines.flavourText:
Unwieldy and garish became graceful
and deadly in Ungil's nimble hands.

lines.name: Taproot

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana against Poisoned Enemies
0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Maimed Enemies

lines.flavourText: Some things must die so that others can live.

lines.name: Scaeva

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life per Red Socket
+10% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier per Green Socket
0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
8% increased Global Defences per White Socket
(60-80)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance when in Main Hand
+8% Chance to Block Attack Damage when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Even from the back rows,
the whistling steel was mesmerising.
They watched the dance in the arena dust, silent as the dead.
A spell only broken by the spilling of blood.

lines.name: Advancing Fortress

implicitModifiers.text: +(21-44) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (21-44) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 12 Fortify
Reflects (71-90) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
"A man cowers behind his walls.
A woman carries her fortress with her.
In heart, in mind, in hand."
- Sekhema Deshret

lines.name: Brightbeak
lines.flavourText:
"I know how to say 'faster' and 'attack'
in Karui, Marak and Ezo."
- Voll of Thebrus

lines.name: Chober Chaber

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems

lines.flavourText: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

lines.name: Doomfletch

implicitModifiers.text: (6-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element
Gain (100-110)% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element

lines.flavourText:
"Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

lines.name: Dreadarc

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Level 10 Flammability on Hit
Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit
Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit, with 40% increased Effect

lines.flavourText:
The fastest way to a man's heart
is through his sternum.

lines.name: Lavianga's Wisdom
lines.flavourText:
"The painful memories are the easiest to recall."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Mightflay

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +10 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain 10 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

lines.flavourText: A mighty beast, a lavish feast.

lines.name: Mortem Morsu

implicitModifiers.text: +20 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
(1.2-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain 20 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
Fear blisters the heart and thins the blood.
Fear squeezes lungs and sets the guts to fester.
Fear is the wound left untended.

lines.name: Widowmaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Full Life
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Love only death
For she shall never let you go.

lines.name: Lifesprig

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Spell Gems
Regenerate (6-8) Life over 1 second when you Cast a Spell

lines.flavourText:
From the smallest seeds
To the tallest redwoods,
Life endures in Wraeclast.

lines.name: Abberath's Horn

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (3-4) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-6) to (8-12) Fire Damage to Spells
Gain 10 Life per Ignited Enemy Killed
+10 Life gained on Killing Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King drank the smoke and ate the flames
as his ruin spread across the land.

lines.name: Bitterdream

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (1-15) Bonechill
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (1-15) Hypothermia
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (1-15) Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Mana Leech
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (1-15) Cold Penetration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (10-15) Added Cold Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (1-15) Inspiration

lines.flavourText:
Fight not the cold
Forsake hope
Be still.

lines.name: Cybil's Paw

implicitModifiers.text: +(15-25) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (15-25) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(5-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Spells
Gain (5-20) Life per Enemy Hit with Spells
(6-8)% increased Spell Damage per 5% Chance to Block Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
Tread lightly, lest their vigil find you.
Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.

lines.name: Fencoil

implicitModifiers.text: +(12-18)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 8 Trap

lines.flavourText:
You've no reason for fear when you're a root in a fen
- Old Ezomyte saying.

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Ichimonji

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Effect of Buffs on you
10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Allies' Aura Buffs do not affect you
Your Aura Buffs do not affect allies

lines.flavourText: Master yourself before you seek to master others.

lines.name: Clayshaper

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 12 Summon Stone Golem Skill
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Golems
Golems have (96-120) to (132-160) Added Attack Physical Damage
Minions' Attacks deal (5-8) to (12-16) additional Physical Damage
Minions deal (5-8) to (12-16) Added Attack Physical Damage
Minions deal (5-8) to (12-16) additional Attack Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
There is nothing, flesh, spirit, or stone
Free from our hunger for dominion.

lines.name: Sign of the Sin Eater

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies inflict Elemental Ailments on you instead of nearby Allies

lines.flavourText: A secret few among the Templars grant absolution by bearing the guilt of others.

lines.name: Sire of Shards

implicitModifiers.text: +(18-20)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText: That which was broken may yet break.

lines.name: Ashcaller

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 10 Summon Raging Spirit on Kill
Adds (20-24) to (38-46) Fire Damage to Spells
10% chance to Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom
